test_description: Text and image provide complementary information
text_input:
Build a food delivery app similar to Swiggy or Zomato.
            
            Key requirements:
            - User authentication and profiles
            - Real-time order tracking with GPS
            - Multiple payment options (card, wallet, cash)
            - Restaurant ratings and reviews
            - Push notifications for order updates
            
            Budget: $30,000
            Timeline: 4 months
            Platform: iOS and Android

intent.problem_being_solved: Provide a platform for users to order food from restaurants with delivery options.

constraints.impact: Limits the scope and features of the app
Requires efficient project management and development

deliverables.item: iOS and Android food delivery app

assumptions.assumption: The app will have a similar feature set to Swiggy or Zomato.
assumptions.risk_if_wrong: The app may not meet user expectations or market standards.
